title: As per the undertaking submitted by you in respect of recreational open space as stipulated in Regulation No
clause_text: As per the undertaking submitted by you in respect of recreational open space as stipulated in Regulation No.3.4, the said open space admeasuring ------- Sq.m. stand vested in the name of plot holders of the layout or society of the plot holders and you have no right of ownership or interest in the said recreational open space. This permission does not entitle you to develop the land which does not vest in you. 5.
section: Duties and Responsibilities of Geotechnical Engineer :
